name: Richard Meeks
text: I ordered their bacon pizza and was so happy with their service. The pizza had the finest crust and was so cheesy. I would definitely love to visit this place time and again.

name: The J Guy 51106
text: I loved this place so much that I ordered from here 1 once a week but sadly it closed down.

name: T T
text: Cheese pizza for my teen majority of the time and this location makes their pizzas better than many other Little Caesars locations near by ...but our last pizza was burnt ( hot and ready ) I didn't return it but I don't expect it again.. I …More

name: Johhny Michael
text: Worst Little Caesars I have ever been to. Overcooked and SO dry! I called to complain about the cardboard pizza and the manager refused to recognize even the possibility that it was poorly made. Instead she insisted that their pizzas are fresh and questioned why I waited a day to call and complain.

name: Brandon Ross
text: I have to give these guys a shout out.  We were looking for pizza late one night coming out of the city and couldn’t find parking or anything and finally we remembered this place across from the Walmart.  They close at 10 and we showed up …More

name: John Almquist
text: Very fast and consistent.  Pizza here is always decent enough for something quick - and a whole large pizza is just $5.99!  It's not great - or fancy - or dine-in - but then again, it's not supposed to be.

name: Adrienne Powell
text: Unfriendly service. Unclean.  Food was not hot and fresh.

name: Mervin Brito
text: Horrible service the young lady (cashier) forgot what I order and therefore I waited for over 25 mins for a stuffed crust and barbecue wings. Not even an apology on her behalf very rude told me "you just got to wait". …More

name: Known Unknown
text: The food is good. Never had any issues but I have to wait for my pizza to be cooked when the slogan says "Hot n Ready". Other than that we cool

name: A Sister's
text: The pizzas are delisous but they ate small even the large one but it is very good

name: Corrina Oneill
text: Very poor customer service. Very rude employees. Would have better service if you hire some homeless off the streets instead of unthankful females who have to have an attitude even if you simply call to ask what the closing times are. Please hire staff with morals and respect. No reason for them all to have deplorable attitudes.

name: Chibale Wills
text: Stay away from this little Caesars!!!  This store has horrible customer service.  The staff is rude and does not respect its customers.  I’m not sure why Little Caesars corp, still allows this franchise to operate because it is damaging …More

name: fabian roa
text: I try to place an order by phone at 9:36 pm but no one answered the phone I guess cause they were ready to close at 10 didn't want to take more orders bad thing about the place, that I try several times

name: Jim Bradford
text: Place was clean, folks were nice, pizza was Great !! And, the price was good.

name: Michaela Tucker
text: I enjoy the food it's great. I can't get enough. I am always back for more.

name: Sankaya Hall
text: OMG...The worst customer service experience ever! Being from the Midwest, I was SO excited to learn that a new Little Caesars was coming to NW DC. Maybe 3 weeks after its grand opening, I paid a visit to this location and I vowed to never …More

text: Pizza is as to be expected from this business but the cheese bread and the little wings were good

text: When we were ordering from this place, they told us we couldn't order because they thought we were "playing". If I could rate this place 0 stars, I would have. Never ordering from this place again.

text: I usually like ordering from here, but my order just arrived with one incorrect item and another missing item. When I call the number, I only get a busy signal. They really dropped the ball today.
